function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of evaluation of impacts of interventions","Impact":"Uncertainty about the effectiveness of interventions and their potential drawbacks","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough evaluations of the impacts of interventions and adjusting strategies accordingly","Technologies":"Data analytics, monitoring and evaluation tools","People":"General population, healthcare systems","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health departments"},{"Description":"Failure to prioritize health in economic, political, food, and built environment sectors","Impact":"Inadequate resilience to diseases and pandemics, increased vulnerability to health crises","Mitigation":"Incorporating health considerations into policies, regulations, and urban planning","Technologies":"Health impact assessment tools, urban planning software","People":"Policy makers, urban planners, government officials","Owner":"Public health agencies, government authorities, urban planning organizations"}]}
